item.description:
join mountain man Steve R. for a hike this Saturday at Sperry Falls in Woodbridge. the plan is to meet up first at the Starbucks (on Rt. 69, near the Merritt Parkway on-ramp), and then head over to the Falls. Steve advises that this is a mile or so river walk, so wear shoes that can get wet and bring bug spray. people can also take the high road on the top of the ravine. this is an hour or so walk through a cool place.

questions? call Steve R: 203-954-9362
item.name: Sat 6/30 - Sperry Falls River Hike
